basics.name: Bruno Rossani
basics.keyword: Laravel / Back End Developer / Software Developer
basics.label: Laravel | Back End Developer | Software Developer
basics.summary: I'm a diligent Full Stack Developer with a strong commitment to excellence with over 1 year of experience primarily dedicated to Back End development with PHP/Laravel. I'm passionate about creating sophisticated web applications and solutions that resonate with users and drive success. I'm committed to continuous improvement and delivering projects with maximum effort.

work.name: Freelance
work.summary: I focus on implementing modern web technologies to deliver quality solutions. I have created several websites and applications using a variety of key tools and languages, including HTML, CSS, SASS, JavaScript, and technologies like AJAX, MySQL, and Node.js, although undoubtedly my favorite language/framework is PHP/Laravel.
highlights: Led the implementation of PayPal payment gateways and token-based authentication systems to ensure transaction security in multiple projects with Stripe.

Supervised the implementation of web optimization strategies, including lazy loading, caching, and reducing HTTP requests, significantly improving loading times and user experience in application development.
Led the development of administration panels, offering efficient content, user, and data management.

education.institution: School of Music at Fine Arts, UDELAR
courses: Applied musical analysis, with solid technical skill in musical performance and outstanding ability to sight-read music.
Notable experience in advanced technical development, standing out for my skill and outstanding abilities in musical performance.

certificates.name: Laravel - Build Applications and Websites with PHP 8 and MVC
highlights: Complete course on Laravel and its ecosystem focused on its MVC structure, Blade for data presentation, Eloquent ORM for advanced queries, and integration of user authentication functions with Breeze. File management and additional topics like middleware and notifications.

certificates.name: Complete Web Development with HTML5, CSS3, JS AJAX PHP and MySQL
highlights: This course covers the fundamentals and key technologies for modern web development, including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, AJAX, Node.js, PHP, and MySQL.

certificates.name: Preliminary English Test (PET) - Council of Europe Level B1 - Pass with Merit
highlights: Issued by Cambridge English. This certificate demonstrates my English language ability at level B1, validated by the Council of Europe.

projects.name: Chat App
projects.description: A real-time chat application inspired by WhatsApp Web, built with the TALL Stack and WebSockets for seamless messaging.
